name: Survivor Slots
description:
Basic Tips:

  • Activities (buttons at the top) must have reels with the shown items ADJACENT and IN ORDER
  • Use the arrows on the reels to get to the slots you need
  • Use the reel guide on the right panel to figure out how many actions it takes to reach a slot
  • Vegetation, rats, storms, and tigers don't harm you, but they do take up valuable space in your slots

Advanced Tips:

  • Remove as many obstacles as you can early on. Things will get tough if they compound
  • If you find yourself lacking Actions, go for Beach Parties as they will earn you more (requires 4 castaways)
